author: Stephanie Busari and Aisha Salaudeen, CNN
title: 'We don't work, we don't eat': Informal workers face stark choices as Africa's largest megacity shuts down
description: Nigeria, Africa's most populous country, became the latest country on the continent to impose a 14-day lockdown in major states but daily wage earners are complaining of hunger.
content: As at February 29th, 2020, the Federal Government has identified 10,695,360 individuals in 35 states across the country as the poorest and most vulnerable Nigerians, during this crisis of #COVID19 pandemic, President @MBuhari directed the @FMHDSD to look and … [+91 chars]
